alert.note: Alert for Coastal Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued January 14 at 8:53AM EST until January 14 at 8:00PM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EST THIS EVENING FOR LOW HUMIDITY, ROBUST WINDS, AND HIGH ERC VALUES FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 068 AND 168... The National Weather Service in Miami has issued a Fire Weather Watch for low humidity, robust winds, and high ERC values, which is in effect until 8 PM EST this evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 068 Metro Palm Beach and Fire Weather Zone 168 Coastal Palm Beach. * TIMING...This afternoon and evening. * WIND...20 foot winds around 10-15 mph with gusts around 25 mph. * HUMIDITY...Low to mid 30s. * ERC...Upper 20s to low 30s.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County
